Hey Guys,

I GOT IT!  Between the two of you, you had the right answer ;-) =
 In the "Install New Software" dialog under Galileo there was nothing there=
 specific to JUnit.  But it occurred to me that installing "EPP Java Packag=
e" and "Java EE IDE Feature" was a reasonable thing to do.

Did that and no=
w JUnit 4.5 is install and I can access the features I previously mentioned=
 were lacking.

Thanks!
